name: Arc Slinger
text: You can twirl your sling in a way that maximizes its effectiveness.
prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, proficient with sling or halfling sling staff.
benefit: When using a sling or sling staff, you reduce your penalty on ranged attack rolls due to range by 2. Point-Blank Shot’s damage bonus applies within the first normal range increment of your sling (50 feet) or sling staff (80 feet).
staminaText: You can spend 1 stamina point when making a sling or sling staff attack to gain the benefits of Point-Blank Shot within the first two range increments of the sling or staff.
text_zh: 你用最能发挥其性能的方式旋转你的投石索。
prerequisites_zh: 近距射击，擅长投石索或半身人投石杖（halfling sling staff）。
benefit_zh: 当你使用投石索或投石杖，你能减少2点由距离造成的远程攻击投骰减值。在投石武器的第一个射程增量里（投石索50尺，投石杖80尺），可以适用你的“近距射击”伤害加值。
staminaText_zh: 在使用投石索或半身人投石杖时，你可以花费一点耐力，在头两个射程增量中获得近距射击的效果
